definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/just a handful/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
uncountable noun (in grammar of European languages)
countable noun (in grammar of European languages)

sentences.english: Actually, it is one of the few industries that does.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這裏有所回報的行業屈指可數。

sentences.english: By the end of his shows, only a few iron beasts still move.
sentences.chinese: 每次表演結束，還能自己動彈的鐵武士就寥寥可數了。

sentences.english: Very few people were present at the meeting.
Classes seem without enough weight, consisting of only a few members.
sentences.chinese: 類顯得不夠重量級，僅僅包含屈指可數的幾個成員。

sentences.english: The few while you are here.
sentences.chinese: 你在這裏的時間已屈指可數。

sentences.english: For thousands of years, the perils of the sea have claimed uncountable numbers of victims.
sentences.chinese: 千百年來，大海的危險已造成受害者不可數號碼。

sentences.english: Count nouns can be used with numbers.
sentences.chinese: 可數名詞可與數字連用。

sentences.english: Even a cat has limited number of lives.
sentences.chinese: 連一隻貓也只有屈指可數的幾條命，何況人乎？

sentences.english: It's no wonder that Taiwan's diplomatic allies can almost be counted on one hand.
sentences.chinese: 難怪臺灣的邦交國一直以來都屈指可數。

sentences.english: The word "person" is a countable noun.
'Walk', 'jog', and 'run' are also used as both verbs and countable nouns. They refer to travel on foot.
sentences.chinese: Jog和Run都可以用作動詞和可數名詞。

sentences.english: They were directed to complete a countability judgment test.
sentences.chinese: 他們依指示完成判斷可數性質的測驗。

sentences.english: Around the pool, there are green willows approaching ground, green cedar rising to sky, clean water and countable swimming fishes.
sentences.chinese: 潭周綠柳垂地，翠柏指天，泉水清澈，游魚可數。

sentences.english: There is no room for me to stand in the bus.
sentences.chinese: 在此是不可數名詞，表示“地方，空間”。

sentences.english: This is an uncountable noun. It has no plural form .
sentences.chinese: 這是個不可數名詞，沒有複數形式。

sentences.english: Netherlands than in bright stars, Stephen Strasburg Jersey only a handful of Japan's star.
sentences.chinese: 相比於荷蘭隊耀眼的星光，日本隊的球星屈指可數。
